## rhmas docs

Open documentation in browser

### Synopsis

Opens the Red Hat Managed Application Services CLI documentation in your default web browser

```
rhmas docs [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --browser   Open documentation in your browser (default true)
  -h, --help      help for docs
```
